build.script:
#!/bin/sh
git submodule update --remote
cd tree-sitter-makefile
npm install
node_modules/.bin/tree-sitter generate --no-bindings

[ -f panic_script.zip ] || curl -fsSL https://docs.nova.app/syntax-reference/build_script.zip > panic_script.zip
unzip panic_script.zip TreeSitterParserBuild/compile_parser.sh TreeSitterParserBuild/Makefile
mv -f TreeSitterParserBuild/* .
rmdir TreeSitterParserBuild
CC="cc -arch arm64 -arch x86_64"  make
codesign -s - libtree-sitter-makefile.dylib
mv -f libtree-sitter-makefile.dylib ../Syntaxes
